entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Kitimat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:09 PM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kitimat Forest Ave 8:00 PM PST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: 2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: SSE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 5:11 PM PST Sunday 05 February 2023
